channel.title: Technology on Timur Ergen
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on Timur Ergen

item.title: Paper on technological innovation and pragmatist thought
item.description: Der Aufsatz entwickelt eine neopragmatistische Theorie technologischer Innovation.

item.title: Innovation and Society (University of Cologne)
item.description: This seminar introduces social science perspectives on the origins, forms, and effects of innovation, examining where inventions come from how societies shape and are shaped by technological change.

item.title: Große Hoffnungen und brüchige Koalitionen: Politik, Industrie und die schwierige Durchsetzung der Photovoltaik
item.description: The book reconstructs the history of policies to support solar photovoltaics across countries.
